title: Combat fatigue: insomnia
brief_description: Describes one of the milder effects of combat fatigue in its portrayal of one sailor’s inability to sleep. Solution is offered through some simple relaxation techniques. Stars Dick York (famed for “Bewitched” TV series, etc).
